import React, { Component } from "react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Message, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react" class NewSongForm extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { title: "", genre: "", description: "", song_link: this.audioInput } this.audioInput = React.createRef() } handleNewSongSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(this.audioInput.current.files) } handleNewSongChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render() { // console.log(this.state) return (
New Song

) } } export default NewSongForm
